Independent watchmakers make watches all by themselves.
Usually, a company would have people assigned to design,...
...but independent watchmakers do all of that by themselves.
If you need a practical watch, the world is never short or far more accurate...
But these timepieces are going to accompany you on a life's journey.
They would stop if you do not wind them up for two days...
Humans need to look after them to make them work...
...and I think that is the charm of these watches.
